argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | djhunss.h | |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) |
| 2 |  | djhunss.u | |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) |
| 3 |  | djhunss.v | |- V = ( Base ` U ) |
| 4 |  | djhunss.j | |- .\/ = ( ( joinH ` K ) ` W ) |
| 5 |  | djhunss.k | |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) |
| 6 |  | djhunss.x | |- ( ph -> X C_ V ) |
| 7 |  | djhunss.y | |- ( ph -> Y C_ V ) |
| 8 | 1, 2, 5 | #P_dvhlmod | |- ( ph -> U e. LMod ) |
| 9 | 6, 7 | #P_unssd | |- ( ph -> ( X u. Y ) C_ V ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( LSpan ` U ) = ( LSpan ` U ) |
| 11 | 3, 10 | #P_lspssid | |- ( ( U e. LMod /\ ( X u. Y ) C_ V ) -> ( X u. Y ) C_ ( ( LSpan ` U ) ` ( X u. Y ) ) ) |
| 12 | 8, 9, 11 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> ( X u. Y ) C_ ( ( LSpan ` U ) ` ( X u. Y ) ) ) |
| 13 | 1, 2, 3, 10, 4, 5, 6, 7 | #P_djhspss | |- ( ph -> ( ( LSpan ` U ) ` ( X u. Y ) ) C_ ( X .\/ Y ) ) |
| 14 | 12, 13 | #P_sstrd | |- ( ph -> ( X u. Y ) C_ ( X .\/ Y ) ) |
